General.Name: Federal Corp
General.Description: Federal Corporation produces and sells tires in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers drift, ultra high performance, high performance, passenger car, touring, SUV, commercial, and winter tires. Federal Corporation was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.369, Chung Hwa Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32068
